body:
Reason: vacation to england, I hope I meet yoav/andy! :D

date of depart: june 10th 
date of return: july 3rd 

I will still be able to go on TS, skype and the forums (Thanks to my Iphone), but I will not be able to play MC,.
If anybody needs to contact me, email me, contact details are on my profile.



Thanks, and cheers! :D
